about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should:

about.name: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: | When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

suggestedAnswer.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

comment.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down before you start to change lanes.

comment.text: Slow down before you start to change lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Assume there is enough space in the next lane for your vehicle, if you signal first.

comment.text: Assume there is enough space in the next lane for your vehicle, if you signal first.

acceptedAnswer.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

comment.text: Signal for at least five seconds.

answerExplanation.text: Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

comment.text: When changing lanes on a freeway, you should: | Signal at least five seconds prior to a changing lanes on a freeway. Always signal when turning left or right, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping to let other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians know your intentions.

hasPart.name: If a child is riding a bicycle near your vehicle:

about.name: If a child is riding a bicycle near your vehicle:

hasPart.assesses: If a child is riding a bicycle near your vehicle: | If a child is riding a bicycle near your vehicle: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Children on bicycles are sometimes unpredictable. Young bicyclists are especially likely to make surprising changes in direction. Remember that children and bicycles are both small in stature and may become difficult to see.

comment.text: Beep your horn.

suggestedAnswer.text: Expect the child to be in total control of the bicycle.

comment.text: Expect the child to be in total control of the bicycle.
Expect the unexpected.
Expect the unexpected.

answerExplanation.text: Children on bicycles are sometimes unpredictable. Young bicyclists are especially likely to make surprising changes in direction. Remember that children and bicycles are both small in stature and may become difficult to see.

comment.text: If a child is riding a bicycle near your vehicle: | Children on bicycles are sometimes unpredictable. Young bicyclists are especially likely to make surprising changes in direction. Remember that children and bicycles are both small in stature and may become difficult to see.

hasPart.name: If you are driving on a highway next to a single broken white line marking:

about.name: If you are driving on a highway next to a single broken white line marking:

hasPart.assesses: If you are driving on a highway next to a single broken white line marking: | If you are driving on a highway next to a single broken white line marking: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: White lines separate lanes of traffic moving in the same direction. You may cross a dashed white line to pass or change lanes if it is safe to do so.

suggestedAnswer.text: You cannot cross the line to pass.

comment.text: You cannot cross the line to pass.

suggestedAnswer.text: You may cross the line to pass and change lanes.

comment.text: You may cross the line to pass and change lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: You may only cross the line to change lanes if you are in the left lane.

comment.text: You may only cross the line to change lanes if you are in the left lane.

acceptedAnswer.text: You may cross the line to pass and change lanes.

comment.text: You may cross the line to pass and change lanes.

answerExplanation.text: White lines separate lanes of traffic moving in the same direction. You may cross a dashed white line to pass or change lanes if it is safe to do so.

comment.text: If you are driving on a highway next to a single broken white line marking: | White lines separate lanes of traffic moving in the same direction. You may cross a dashed white line to pass or change lanes if it is safe to do so.

hasPart.name: Always carefully look for motorcycles before you change lanes because:

about.name: Always carefully look for motorcycles before you change lanes because:

hasPart.assesses: Always carefully look for motorcycles before you change lanes because: | Always carefully look for motorcycles before you change lanes because: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You should check carefully for motorcycles when changing lanes because their small size makes it easy for them to disappear into your blind spots.

suggestedAnswer.text: Their small size can make them hard to see.

comment.text: Their small size can make them hard to see.

suggestedAnswer.text: They usually have the right-of-way at intersections.

comment.text: They usually have the right-of-way at intersections.

suggestedAnswer.text: It is illegal for motorcycles to share traffic lanes.

comment.text: It is illegal for motorcycles to share traffic lanes.

acceptedAnswer.text: Their small size can make them hard to see.

comment.text: Their small size can make them hard to see.

answerExplanation.text: You should check carefully for motorcycles when changing lanes because their small size makes it easy for them to disappear into your blind spots.

comment.text: Always carefully look for motorcycles before you change lanes because: | You should check carefully for motorcycles when changing lanes because their small size makes it easy for them to disappear into your blind spots.

hasPart.name: The safest precaution that you can take when using cellular phones while driving is:

about.name: The safest precaution that you can take when using cellular phones while driving is:

hasPart.assesses: The safest precaution that you can take when using cellular phones while driving is: | The safest precaution that you can take when using cellular phones while driving is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Minors may not use a cellular phone while driving, except for certain emergencies. Cell phones are allowed to be used by drivers over age 18, but a hands-free device should be used.

suggestedAnswer.text: To use hands-free devices so you can keep both hands on the steering wheel.

comment.text: To use hands-free devices so you can keep both hands on the steering wheel.

suggestedAnswer.text: To keep your phone within easy reach so you won't need to take your eyes off the road.

comment.text: To keep your phone within easy reach so you won't need to take your eyes off the road.

suggestedAnswer.text: To review the number before answering a call.

comment.text: To review the number before answering a call.

acceptedAnswer.text: To use hands-free devices so you can keep both hands on the steering wheel.

comment.text: To use hands-free devices so you can keep both hands on the steering wheel.

answerExplanation.text: Minors may not use a cellular phone while driving, except for certain emergencies. Cell phones are allowed to be used by drivers over age 18, but a hands-free device should be used.

comment.text: The safest precaution that you can take when using cellular phones while driving is: | Minors may not use a cellular phone while driving, except for certain emergencies. Cell phones are allowed to be used by drivers over age 18, but a hands-free device should be used.

hasPart.name: You are approaching an intersection where a traffic signal is displaying a steady yellow light. If you have not already entered the intersection, you should:

about.name: You are approaching an intersection where a traffic signal is displaying a steady yellow light. If you have not already entered the intersection, you should:

hasPart.assesses: You are approaching an intersection where a traffic signal is displaying a steady yellow light. If you have not already entered the intersection, you should: | You are approaching an intersection where a traffic signal is displaying a steady yellow light. If you have not already entered the intersection, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: At an intersection controlled by a steady yellow light, you should bring your vehicle to a safe stop. If you are already within the intersection when the light changes from green to yellow, continue through the intersection at a safe speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Speed up to beat the red light.

comment.text: Speed up to beat the red light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce you speed and proceed carefully through the intersection.

comment.text: Reduce you speed and proceed carefully through the intersection.
Come to a safe stop.
Come to a safe stop.

answerExplanation.text: At an intersection controlled by a steady yellow light, you should bring your vehicle to a safe stop. If you are already within the intersection when the light changes from green to yellow, continue through the intersection at a safe speed.

comment.text: You are approaching an intersection where a traffic signal is displaying a steady yellow light. If you have not already entered the intersection, you should: | At an intersection controlled by a steady yellow light, you should bring your vehicle to a safe stop. If you are already within the intersection when the light changes from green to yellow, continue through the intersection at a safe speed.
